title: The Doctor Zone Files
description: Chronological time is just an abstraction when you’re with Doctor Zone!
quote: Righty crikey and tally ho. Time waits for no man… Except for me!
altHero: Doctor Zone and Tim Ape in a futuristic city
alt1: Doctor Zone and Tim Ape running
alt2: Doctor Zone and Tim Ape in a coffee shop
alt4: bumble bee car zapping garbage can robots
